chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: System
closedT1: ClosedSystem LNN T

Goal:
forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH A B) -> RepresentableHelp n f A -> RepresentableHelp n f B

Premises:
Formula = fol.Formula LNN : Set
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNN : fol.System LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> Prop
iffH = fol.iffH LNN : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
ClosedSystem : forall L : Language, fol.System L -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A
naryFunc = fix naryFunc (n : nat) : Set := match n with | 0 => nat | S n0 => nat -> naryFunc n0 end : nat -> Set Arguments naryFunc _%nat_scope
RepresentableHelp : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
RepresentableHalf2Alternate : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf T (impH A B) -> RepresentableHalf2 n f A -> RepresentableHalf2 n f B
RepresentableHalf1Alternate : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf T (impH A B) -> RepresentableHalf1 n f B -> RepresentableHalf1 n f A
RepresentableHalfHelp : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), RepresentableHalf1 n f A -> RepresentableHalf2 n f A -> RepresentableHelp n f A
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope
Inductive prod (A B : Type) : Type := pair : A -> B -> A * B Arguments prod (_ _)%type_scope Arguments pair {A B}%type_scope
prod_ind : forall (A B : Type) (P : A * B -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (b : B), P (a, b)) -> forall p : A * B, P p
Inductive sum (A B : Type) : Type := inl : A -> A + B | inr : B -> A + B Arguments sum (_ _)%type_scope Arguments inl {A B}%type_scope, [A] _ _ Arguments inr {A B}%type_scope, _ [B] _
VectorDef.t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop), P 0 (VectorDef.nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t
VectorDef.t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Type), P 0 (VectorDef.nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t
VectorDef.cons : forall A : Type, A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n)
iffTrans : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (iffH g h) -> SysPrf T (iffH f h)
primRec.compose2IsPR : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n), primRec.isPR n f -> forall g : naryFunc (S n), primRec.isPR (S n) g -> primRec.isPR n (primRec.compose2 n f g)
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n v2)) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 where ?A : [T : System closedT1 : ClosedSystem LNN T |- Type] ?B : [T : System closedT1 : ClosedSystem LNN T |- Type]
iffSym : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (iffH g f)
Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : VectorDef.t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n) Arguments VectorDef.t _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.nil _%type_scope Arguments VectorDef.cons _%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
primRec.ignoreParamsIsPR : forall (n m : nat) (f : naryFunc n), primRec.isPR n f -> primRec.isPR (m + n) (primRec.ignoreParams n m f)
proj1_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> A
iffE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f g)
iffI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (iffH f g)
Inductive sumbool (A B : Prop) : Set := left : A -> {A} + {B} | right : B -> {A} + {B} Arguments sumbool (_ _)%type_scope Arguments left {A B}%type_scope, [A] _ _ Arguments right {A B}%type_scope, _ [B] _
iffE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
primRec.compose1_NIsPR : forall (n : nat) (g : naryFunc (S n)), primRec.isPR (S n) g -> forall f : naryFunc 1, primRec.isPR 1 f -> primRec.isPR (S n) (fun x : nat => g (f x))
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
existT : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : A), P x -> {x : A & P x}

```coq
intros n f A B Hprf Hrep.
apply RepresentableHalfHelp.
- apply RepresentableHalf1Alternate with (A := A) (B := B); assumption.
- apply RepresentableHalf2Alternate with (A := A) (B := B); assumption.
Qed.```

original: intros n f A B Hprf Hrep. apply RepresentableHalfHelp. - apply RepresentableHalf1Alternate with (A := A) (B := B); auto. - apply RepresentableHalf2Alternate with (A := A) (B := B); auto.
